Articles.Content:
Well, I've just bought in.

But where's the website gone? I downloaded onto my laptop when I bought but it isn't up to running things.

Went back to get the windows version and the website seems to be down.

Is there an ftp site or anything?

cheers

We had some server issues this morning and they should be all fixed up now.

For future reference, to check on the status of the various KSP servers, check the following URL and bookmark it.

http://status.kerbalspaceprogram.com/

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
